name: Nintendo GameCube Preview Disc
overview: Contains playable demos of the following: - Sonic Adventure DX Director's Cut - Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell - Viewtiful Joe - Billy Hatcher and the Giant Egg - Soul Calibur II. It also contains 2 downloadable games for Game Boy Advance: - Dr. Mario - Wario Ware, Inc. Finally, it contains non-playable previews of the follwowing: - F-Zero GX, - The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker - Star Wars Rogue Squadron II: Rebel Strike - NCAA Football 2004 - Madden 2004.
